price: Ya ce: "Wannan rãkuma ce tanã da shan* yini, kuma kunã da shan yini sasanne."
arabic: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٞ لَّهَا شِرۡبٞ وَلَكُمۡ شِرۡبُ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
footnotes: * Kuna zaton zã a bar ku a irin wannan ni'ima' Allah bã zai karɓi rãyukanku ba kuma Ya yi muku hisãbi a kanta? Kayya! Zã a yi muku hisãbi a bãyan kun mutu an tsayar da ku, dõmin hisãbin ayyukan da kuka yi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla hādhihi nāqatun lahā shir'bun walakum shir'bu yawmin maʿlūmin
